body_html:
It would be great to have consistency with what bazel see and what virtualenv see.

Looking at the output from your build 17 - it says "Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): tensorflow==0.7.1". Have you tried adding "--upgrade" to pip install?

Ideally it should upgrade tensorflow but not the other packages.

Ideally it should upgrade tensorflow but not the other packages.
body:
It would be great to have consistency with what bazel see and what virtualenv see.

Looking at the output from your build 17 - it says "Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): tensorflow==0.7.1". Have you tried adding "--upgrade" to pip install?

Ideally it should upgrade tensorflow but not the other packages.
